00037 #include "btkLandmarksFileReader.h"
00038 
00039 // STL includes
00040 #include "iostream"
00041 #include "fstream"
00042 #include "cctype"
00043 #include "cstdlib"
00044 
00045 
00046 namespace btk
00047 {
00048 
00049 btkLandmarksFileReader::btkLandmarksFileReader()
00050 {
00051     m_filename = "";
00052 
00053     for(unsigned int i=0; i<4; i++)
00054     {
00055         m_lpt[i] = 0;
00056         m_rpt[i] = 0;
00057         m_ppt[i] = 0;
00058         m_apt[i] = 0;
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void btkLandmarksFileReader::SetInputFileName(const std::string &filename)
00063 {
00064     m_filename = filename;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void btkLandmarksFileReader::Update()
00068 {
00069     std::fstream file(m_filename.c_str(), std::fstream::in);
00070 
00071     if(!file.is_open())
00072     {
00073         std::cout << "Error: Unable to read the landmarks file !" << std::endl;
00074     }
00075     else // file is open
00076     {
00077         std::string s;
00078         unsigned int found = 0;
00079 
00080         while(found < 4 && std::getline(file,s))
00081         {
00082             if(s.size() >= 1 && s[0] != '#')
00083             {
00084                 std::vector<std::string> splitted;
00085 
00086                 if(this->SplitString(s, ',', splitted) >= 3)
00087                 {
00088                     unsigned int triplet = 0;
00089                     unsigned int i       = 0;
00090 
00091                     while(triplet < 3 && i<splitted.size())
00092                     {
00093                         if(this->IsNumber(splitted[i]))
00094                         {
00095                             if(found == 0)
00096                                 m_lpt[triplet] = atof(splitted[i].c_str());
00097                             else if(found == 1)
00098                                 m_rpt[triplet] = atof(splitted[i].c_str());
00099                             else if(found == 2)
00100                                 m_ppt[triplet] = atof(splitted[i].c_str());
00101                             else
00102                                 m_apt[triplet] = atof(splitted[i].c_str());
00103 
00104                             triplet++;
00105                         }
00106 
00107                         i++;
00108                     }
00109 
00110                     if(triplet != 3)
00111                     {
00112                         std::cout << "Error: There is a mistake in the landmarks file !" << std::endl;
00113                     }
00114                     else
00115                         found++;
00116                 }
00117             }
00118         }
00119 
00120         if(found != 4)
00121         {
00122             std::cout << "Error: There is a mistake in the landmarks file !" << std::endl;
00123         }
00124 
00125         file.close();
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 double *btkLandmarksFileReader::GetOutputLPT()
00130 {
00131     return m_lpt;
00132 }
00133 
00134 double *btkLandmarksFileReader::GetOutputRPT()
00135 {
00136     return m_rpt;
00137 }
00138 
00139 double *btkLandmarksFileReader::GetOutputPPT()
00140 {
00141     return m_ppt;
00142 }
00143 
00144 double *btkLandmarksFileReader::GetOutputAPT()
00145 {
00146     return m_apt;
00147 }
00148 
00149 inline int btkLandmarksFileReader::SplitString(std::string &string, char separator, std::vector<std::string> &strings)
00150 {
00151     strings.clear();
00152 
00153     std::string::size_type spPos = string.find(separator);
00154 
00155     while(spPos != std::string::npos)
00156     {
00157         strings.push_back(string.substr(0,spPos));
00158         string = string.substr(spPos+1);
00159         spPos  = string.find(separator);
00160     }
00161 
00162     strings.push_back(string);
00163 
00164     return strings.size();
00165 }
00166 
00167 inline bool btkLandmarksFileReader::IsNumber(const std::string &string)
00168 {
00169     bool isNumber  = true;
00170     unsigned int i = 0;
00171 
00172     while(isNumber && i<string.size())
00173     {
00174         if(!std::isdigit(string[i]) && string[i] != '.' && string[i] != '-')
00175             isNumber = false;
00176 
00177         i++;
00178     }
00179 
00180     return isNumber;
00181 }
00182
